title: Boot Sequence (And Why It Took 2 Years to Run)
description: Why I built this terminal-shaped mirror of my mind. And why you're inside it now. This site didn't take two years to build. It took me two years to become someone who could finish it.

title: Markdown Playground (Kinda Features Showcase, Not Really)
description: A showcase of all the advanced Markdown features available on this blog. From code blocks to tables, this post demonstrates the full range of capabilities.

title: Patch Notes v1.1 on a Friday Midnight
description: I launched. Got rekt. Didn’t cry. Just patched the damn thing. Building something beautiful on the web is never as easy as it looks. But every bug, every crash, and every “why is this so slow?!” moment taught me something new.

title: The Reckoning
description: A deep dive into the challenges faced during the development process and the lessons learned along the way.

title: Cementing the Future: A Journey Through VR Training
description: Exploring the innovative use of virtual reality in training for the cement industry, and the lessons learned from this groundbreaking project.

title: GreedySnek: A 3D Multiplayer Revisit of the Classic Snake Game
description: A modern take on the classic Snake game, GreedySnek brings multiplayer fun to a 3D environment, showcasing the evolution of game design and player interaction.

title: Kill Bad Guys: A Game Jam Experience
description: A behind-the-scenes look at the development that pushed the limits of creativity under tight deadlines.

title: Rust Game Engine: Building a Game from Scratch
description: An exploration of the process of building a game engine in Rust, highlighting the challenges and triumphs of creating a robust gaming framework.

title: The SyncLippy: A Universal Clipboard for All Your Devices
description: An exploration of the process of building a universal clipboard application that syncs across all devices, highlighting the challenges and triumphs of creating a seamless user experience.
